description: This file defines middleware functions for security headers and request logging in a Node.js Express application, including functions to apply security headers and request logging, as well as a helper to register both.

methods.name: applySecurity(app)
methods.description: Middleware to set security-related HTTP headers that help mitigate common web vulnerabilities, with conditional HSTS header for HTTPS traffic.

methods.name: applyRequestLogger(app)
methods.description: Middleware to log details of each HTTP request in JSON format, including method, URL, status, response time, user agent, remote address, and process ID.

methods.name: registerSecurityAndLogging(app)
methods.description: Convenience function to register both the request logger and security headers middleware in the correct order.
